p:
According to the analytical chemistry results, the total oil retained corresponded to 28.4 g, while the surface oil retained was 4.8 g. This yielded an 83% mass encapsulation efficiency as a result of the 33.32 g of EO added to the initial mixture for the preparation of the capsules, of which 28.4 g was maintained.
